---
title: "Historical Delta T"
lightbox: true
---

Below are two-panel maps showing maximum Delta T and wind speed at the time of maximum Delta T for North Dakota over the past seven days. They are derived from North Dakota Agricultural Weather Network hourly data, which is available at [NDAWN.org](https://ndawn.ndsu.nodak.edu/current.html).

Use the navigation menu to access historical maps dating back to May 1.

```{r}
#| include: false
require(fs)
require(purrr)
require(lubridate)
require(stringr)

imgpaths <- map(
  1:7,
  \(x)
   dir_ls(
     path = "./maps_historical",
     recurse = TRUE,
     regexp = str_c("historical-both-", Sys.Date()-days(x))
     ) |> 
     path_rel()
  ) |> 
  set_names(str_c("h",1:7))
```
